name: use-alpha-blended-color
description: Hook to blend the alpha channels of a color
author: Derk-Jan Karrenbeld <derk-jan+github@karrenbeld.info>

scripts.build: yarn build:module && yarn build:main && yarn build:dts
scripts.build:module: yarn tsc --module es2015 --outDir build && move build\useAlphaBlendedColor.js .\useAlphaBlendedColor.es.js
scripts.build:main: yarn tsc --module commonjs --outDir build && move build\useAlphaBlendedColor.js .\useAlphaBlendedColor.cjs.js
